smac.util

Class SmacDirectoryWatcherService

  • java.lang.Object
    • smac.util.SmacDirectoryWatcherService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class SmacDirectoryWatcherService
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The SmacDirectoryWatcherService class watches for changes that occur to a SMAC input queue directory and creates the required SMAC daemon task based on the changes observed.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Bishan Kumar Madhoo
